disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Divine Ascent.

blurb.value: As Kayle gains levels, she ascends into a new form, becoming stronger. Level 1 - Zealous: Basic attacks grant stacks of Zeal, progressively granting  attack speed. At max stacks, she becomes Exalted, gaining  bonus movement speed. Level 6 - Arisen: Her  range increases as she becomes a ranged champion. Level 11 - Aflame: While Exalted, her basic attack launches a wave of fire. Level 16 - Transcendent: Kayle permanently gains max stacks of Zeal, in addition to gaining even more  range.

description.value: Innate: Upon reaching levels 1, 6, 11, and 16, along with spending a skill point, Kayle ascends into a new form, gaining additional bonuses.

description2.value: Level 1 - Zealous: Kayle on-attack gains a stack of Zeal for 5 seconds, up to 5 stacks, each giving her  6% bonus attack speed for a maximum of 30%. At maximum stacks, Kayle becomes Exalted, gaining  8% bonus movement speed.

description3.value: Level 6 - Arisen: Kayle becomes ranged and gains  350 bonus attack range, for a total of  525.

description4.value: Level 11 - Aflame: While Exalted, Kayle on-attack against non-structures additionally launches a wave of fire in the target's direction, dealing 15 − 35 (based on Starfire Spellblade's Rank) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. The wave is affected by critical strike modifiers.

description5.value: Level 16 - Transcendent: Kayle permanently has maximum stacks of Zeal and gains  50 bonus attack range, for a total of  575.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Prior to becoming Transcendent, while at four stacks of Zeal, the next basic attack on-attack reaching the fifth stack will be empowered by Aflame, releasing the first fire wave. Despite the visual effects, a wave consists of three 200 units wide projectiles to deal damage and a 4th for visuals. Wind Wall and Unbreakable can block each projectile individually. Hitting an enemy with multiple projectiles of the same wave will not increase the damage dealt. The fire waves roll critical strikes on each target hit individually. Fire waves can be redirected by changing Kayle's direction via a blink very early in the attack windup. If Kayle is in her attack animation after the stacks finish, she gains another 0.5 seconds to refresh / stack Zeal. Because Kayle is both a melee and ranged champion, she can purchase both ranged and melee exclusive items at anytime, but their effects will function depending on her range type; the same principle also applies to runes. Giant Strength and Lifeline from Sterak's Gage is disabled after ascending to Arisen. However, Lifeline and its secondary effects may be still triggered by other Lifeline items ( Phantom Dancer and/or Maw of Malmortius). Even after ascending to Arisen, basic attacks in melee range ( 175) do not utilize projectiles. This will not negate the activation of ranged effects (i.e Runaan's Hurricane). This will still not trigger the activation of melee effects (i.e Ravenous Hydra). Due to this fact, Yasuo's Wind Wall and Braum's Unbreakable cannot intercept basic attacks while Kayle's target is within her melee range.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Radiant Blast.

blurb.value: Active: Kayle summons a celestial sword that travels forward and expands upon hitting a target, dealing magic damage, slowing, and reducing the  armor and  magic resistance of all targets struck.

description.value: Active: Kayle conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction. After a 0.25 second delay, a celestial sword launches forward from it.

description2.value: The sword explodes in a cross-like shape upon colliding with an enemy. Targets struck are dealt magic damage, slowed for 2 seconds, and have their  armor and  magic resistance reduced by 15% for 4 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The portal is created at the start of the cast time and it does not follow Kayle's movement, using Flash or getting displaced won't change its position nor direction. The visual effects of the explosion that spreads upon hitting its initial target shows the blade and guard of a sword. The explosion consist of 5 hitboxes, forming a cross-like shape. (center, left, right, backward, and forward) The left side shows projectile's width and the total area traveled if it does not hit a target, while the right side shows the explosions when it hits a target. The resistance reduction is a debuff called Sundered. Since patch V9.17, the cast time matches the cast delay.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Celestial Blessing.

blurb.value: Active: Kayle heals herself and the target allied champion, and both gain bonus movement speed.

description.value: Active: Kayle and the target allied champion are healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

description2.value: If cast without a valid target, or self-cast, Celestial Blessing will automatically target the closest allied champion in range, prioritizing the one with the least amount of  health.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Celestial Blessing's cast time does not interrupt movement and the effects are applied at the start. If cast with auto-targeting, Celestial Blessing may target allies who are untargetable, or allied clones that cannot be targeted by allies such as Wukong's Warrior Trickster).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Starfire Spellblade.

blurb.value: Passive: Kayle deals bonus magic damage on-hit.

blurb2.value: Active: She kindles her blade, causing her next basic attack to deal additional bonus magic damage based on the target's missing health.

description.value: Passive: Kayle's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage on-hit. The fire waves from Divine Ascent deal damage equal to this value.

description2.value: Active: Kayle kindles her blade, causing her next basic attack within 6 seconds to become unstoppable and deal additional bonus magic damage based on the target's  missing health on-hit, capped at 400 against monsters. This effect also grants her  525 range prior to ascending to Arisen.

leveling2.value: Bonus Magic Damage:8 / 9 / 10 / 11 / 12% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's missing health

description3.value: After ascending to Aflame, Starfire Spellblade is upgraded, causing the basic attack to explode around the target, dealing 100% AD physical damage (affected by critical strike modifiers) to all enemies struck and applying on-hit effects to each.

description4.value: Starfire Spellblade resets Kayle's basic attack timer.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The ability consist of 3 different damage source types: The basic attack part is basic. The passive on-hit magic damage is proc. The active's magic damage based on the missing health of the target(s) applies spell. The damage against secondary targets caught in the explosion is also tagged as area of effect. The basic attack portion of the ability is a normal basic attack and will be reduced by Ninja Tabi, even when it's upgraded to an area of effect. Randuin's Omen will also reduce the damage if it does critically strike. While the effect is active a circle is visible to Kayle, indicating her  range. However, this circle only takes into account Divine Ascent's effect on her range, not other sources such as Rapid Firecannon. The increased range will be  675 prior to ascending to Transcendent, after which it's  725. Single-use on-hits (Such as Spellblade) will be applied to the main target. If the main target died prior to the projectile reaching them, or if it was a jungle plant, the effects will be applied to the closest target from the explosion's center. Exception: Guinsoo's Rageblade's Phantom Hit can only be applied to the main target. Because Starfire Spellblade has both basic attack and ability components, it will proc Muramana's Shock twice. The double proc only occurs if the missing health based magic damage deals more than 0 damage. Only the main target can receive double proc, other targets caught by the explosion do not. Parry interactions: Blind: The main target will never receive damage but secondary targets struck in the explosion will receive the bonus magic damage based on their missing health. Dodge: Dodging will always negate all damage. Block: Blocking will always negate all damage. Even if the main target is inside Spirit's Refuge's zone, targets struck in the explosion outside of the area won't block the damage. Basic attacks empowered by Starfire Spellblade have some differences compared to normal basic attacks: The melee range is increased to  200. The projectile speed for the ranged attack is 2000. Starfire Spellblade can behave both as a ranged and melee attack based on how far the target is prior to Kayle ascending to Arisen, after which the attack will be always using ranged standards. If the target is  200 units away or closer, the attack will be considered melee. If the target is over  200 units, the attack will be considered ranged.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Divine Judgment.

blurb.value: Active: Kayle grants herself or an allied champion invulnerability for few seconds, and conjures swords of fire around herself.

blurb2.value: After 1.5 second she rains the swords down around her target, dealing magic damage in the area.

description.value: Active: At the start of the cast time, Kayle grants herself or the target allied champion invulnerability for a few seconds, conjuring swords of holy fire, and highlighting the area around the target.

description2.value: Upon completing the cast time, the swords rain down, dealing magic damage in the highlighted area.

description3.value: Divine Judgment will prioritize casting on allies over Kayle.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Divine Judgment's cast time does not interrupt movement. Prior to becoming Transcended, casting Divine Judgment refreshes the duration of Zealous stacks. Divine Judgment's effects will persist even if Kayle dies during the cast time. The target may still die via Nexus Obelisk, but the ability will still finish at their position regardless. Kayle's basic attack range is set to  400 during Divine Judgment's cast time to bring her within the effective range of the ability if attack commands are issued on an enemy. Rapid Firecannon's Energized behaves strangely with this effect: Before Transcended: After the cast starts it changes from  400 range to  337 range, then after the cast ends it changes from  612 range to  675 range (attack range while Energized). After Transcended: The values are the same after the cast starts, but changes after the cast ends, going from  662 range to  725 range (attack range while Energized). Gaining Energized during the cast time will cause the range to jump between values, averaged around 540 range. The area around the target does not appear if the target is not visible to the enemies' point of view. While the target is invulnerable, a number indicator will appear beneath them whenever they would receive damage to show the amount that was entirely mitigated. This is calculated pre-mitigation, or before resistances and reductions are taken into account. The invulnerability is granted via a buff called Intervention.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
